metadata.title: CVE-2021-21118 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 88.0.4324.96allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memoryaccess via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
